text: The 2020 Styrian Grand Prix (officially known as the Formula 1 Pirelli Gro√üer Preis der Steiermark 2020) was a Formula One motor race that was held on 12 July 2020 at the Red Bull Ring in Spielberg, Austria. The race was the second round of the 2020 Formula One World Championship and marked the first, and possibly the only, running of the Styrian Grand Prix. == Winners == === By year === Year Driver Car Track 2020 Lewis Hamilton Mercedes Red Bull Ring ==References== Notes Category:Formula One Grands Prix Category:2020 establishments in Austria
title: 2020 Styrian Grand Prix
